answers.answer: It tells you if you have gestational diabetes or not. If you fail then you have to adjust your eating to healthier meals and have to test yourself throughout the day. I have to take my 3 hour test today :( and I hate needles with a passion and I'm not looking forward to the getting stabbed 3x today or the fact my son and I are going to be starving so I'm sure I'm going to get cranky.I'm just saying this suck!!! Lol!
